properties.name: freshwater.management.units
properties.description: List of Freshwater Managerment Unit sources, each containing a name and a list of URLs.

properties.name: freshwater.management.units.sources[].name
properties.description: The name of the Freshwater Management Unit source.

properties.name: freshwater.management.units.sources[].urls
properties.description: List of URLs for each Freshwater Management Unit source.

properties.name: tangata.whenua.sites
properties.description: List of Tangata Whenua Site sources, each containing a name and a list of URLs.

properties.name: tangata.whenua.sites.sources[].name
properties.description: The name of the Tangata Whenua Site source.

properties.name: tangata.whenua.sites.sources[].urls
properties.description: List of URLs for each Tangata Whenua Site source.

properties.name: linz.koord.api.key
properties.description: Toitū te Whenua LINZ Data Service Koordinates API key.

properties.name: linz.koord.api.base-url
properties.description: Toitū te Whenua LINZ Data Service API URL.

properties.name: linz.address.boundary.timeout
properties.description: Seconds to wait for LINZ Address Boundary API response.
